Articles.Content:
Is it possible to replace an existing command module on an existing ship? I tried searching but hadn't come up with anything.

Thanks!

fiber0pti, no this is not possible at this time, I have no idea when ir if it will become possible, sorry.

Also, there is no need to bump threads here, and it is considered impolite, don't worry I'll remove the unneeded post
You can replace the command module by editing the .craft file.
Well you can try this, but watch your part position and other values, failing to get them right can cause some weird problems.
I imagine this will be possible in the future sometime.
